subject: - Sick of working for others?
body:
Worldwide Lotto service!

The official, global lottery agent allows you to purchase lottery tickets from over 50 of the leading lotteries from around the world.

With total jackpots passing $500 Million, this is your chance to win huge prizes.

There is only one day left to go and time is running out on your chance to win over $51,500,000.
Its happening this Thursday - over $51 Million to be drawn in the biggest lottery of the week in Europe.
Buy as many tickets as you want and increase your chance to change your life forever.
Over 300,000 ticket holders will win prizes in this week of exciting draws.

Or Search the World for 48 lotteries with total jackpots of US$ 392,101,122 
Get your tickets now to all the leading lotteries from around the world!
